entry.title: $2099 // Spacious Apt *15 MIN to NYC* Heat Water included Large Kitchen NO FEE
entry.content:
RENT DIRECTLY NO FEE
HASSLE FREE MOVE IN PROCESS

If interested, contact Hec at show contact info and mention "Metropolitan"

King size bedroom plus extra office room!

Large 1.5 bedroom in prime location!! Priced to go!

Only a 9 minute train ride into NYC - in a rapidly evolving part of the Williamsburg area. Some of the staples around the neighborhood are: Legion, Variety, Carmine's, Basik, Sage, AWOL Eatery, and much much more!! - Right Next to Cooper Park and Grand Street Campus Field!!

The Apartment - LARGE BEDROOM, King size bedroom with great windows and natural light with large closet, and one additional office / railroad room!

Extra room
Heat and Hot Water included
Pets Allowed
Guarantors Accepted

949 Metropolitan Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11211

TRANSPORTATION
L at Grand St 0.25 miles
L at Graham Av 0.36 miles
L at Montrose Av 0.5 miles
G L at Lorimer St 0.62 miles
L at Morgan Av 0.66 miles
